void mergesort ( int a [ ] , int i , int j ) { int mid ; if ( i < j ) { mid = ( i + j ) / 2 ; mergesort ( a , i , mid ) ; mergesort ( a , mid + 1 , j ) ; merge ( a , i , mid , mid + 1 , j ) ; } }
